library(SpatialQM)

Load Data 

result_seu <- readRDS("/mnt/plummergrp/Yutian/Rscripts/SpatiaTouchstone/SpatialTouchstone/Data/Example_Seurat/SpatialTOUCHSTONE_EAP_XRS_FFPE_PR_3_UOA_C_R1_Seurat.rds")
